SUGGESTION1: ts_std_dev(revenue) low indicates stable top-line. SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION4: revenue userCount 3134. KEEP_IN_MIND: single field, operators small. Confidence 0.5: stability aids forecasting.

SUGGESTION1: inventory returns trending downward (reverse makes positive). SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill used. SUGGESTION4: inventory userCount 1111. KEEP_IN_MIND: single field, minimal ops. Confidence 0.55: destocking often accompanies improving margins.

SUGGESTION1: used fnd6_txdba (deferred tax asset long term) decline as a cleanliness signal. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill and ts_delta applied. SUGGESTION4: txdba userCount 128. KEEP_IN_MIND: single field, ops limited. Confidence 0.32: tax items are complex and low confidence.

results.idea: High operating income correlation with low special items
results.description: SUGGESTION1: ts_corr between operating_income and spce to measure clean operations. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both as coverage 0.5. SUGGESTION4: operating_income userCount strong; spce lower. KEEP_IN_MIND: 2 fields, operator count small. Confidence 0.5: mixed confidence due to spce sparsity.

results.idea: Low option dilution trends (optosey / equity low)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: fnd6_optosey and equity ratio used. SUGGESTION2: n/a. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both. SUGGESTION4: optosey userCount 189 moderate; equity high. KEEP_IN_MIND: 2 fields, small ops. Confidence 0.4: option metrics noisy.

results.idea: Short-term deleveraging (falling debt in current liabilities)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: used debt_st delta to detect reduction. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill and ts_delta used. SUGGESTION4: debt_st userCount 3637. KEEP_IN_MIND: single field, ops small. Confidence 0.58: short-term deleveraging reduces rollover risk.

SUGGESTION1: used drlt/revenue low ratio as visibility sign. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both. SUGGESTION4: drlt userCount 5782. KEEP_IN_MIND: 2 fields, operators limited. Confidence 0.52: useful but sector-dependent.

SUGGESTION1: used operating_income and ppent. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both fields. SUGGESTION4: ppent userCount 1329. KEEP_IN_MIND: 2 fields, small ops. Confidence 0.6: useful in capex-heavy industries.

results.idea: High operating cashflow to capex (investment coverage)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: cashflow / capex used to identify self-funded investment. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill on both. SUGGESTION4: both fields have high userCounts. KEEP_IN_MIND: operators minimal. Confidence 0.7: strong fundamental indicator of sustainability.

results.idea: Relative income volatility to revenue (stability ratio)
results.description: SUGGESTION1: ratio of stddev(income)/stddev(revenue). SUGGESTION2: not applicable. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill then ts_std_dev applied. SUGGESTION4: both fields moderate userCounts. KEEP_IN_MIND: 2 fields, <=7 ops. Confidence 0.54: stable earnings vs top-line improves forecastability.

SUGGESTION1: fnd6_newa2v1300_stkco returns used. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill + ts_returns applied. SUGGESTION4: userCount 199 moderate. KEEP_IN_MIND: single field, small ops. Confidence 0.43: compensation trends may be sector- and cycle-dependent.
